name: Eager
description:
Update: apparently had a minor hiccup with the music. If you've already tried the game, please try it again (and of course, if you've voted, please consider changing your votes accordingly now that there is music in the game). Thanks!

Eager is a game I created for LD34 with the themes growing and two button controls. While Eager does not necessarily have two button controls, it's close!

Eager separates itself from Agar.IO due to the fact that you have to shoot enemies with your mass instead of eating them!

Controls:

  • Left mouse button - create a projectile that will eat enemies
  • Mouse movement - move your bubble!

Enemies vary in size, and speed. They will damage your player, however projectiles will eat them and gain their mass (provided the projectile is big enough). Coins can, however, be eaten by both your player and your projectiles.

Source: http://github.com/Bobrocket/Eager

LD page: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=p...
